text: Bruno Amílcar Valdez Rojas (born 6 October 1992) is a Paraguayan professional footballer who plays for Liga MX club América and the Paraguay national team. A right-footed defender, he can play as a centre-back and right-back. ==Club career== Valdez made his professional debut with Sol de America but in July 2014 it was sold to Cerro Porteño. In 2015, Valdez helped Cerro to win the Apertura championship. In June 2016, Valdez was sold to Club América of Mexico. ==International career== In May 2015, Valdez was called up to the provisional 30-man roster for the Paraguay national football team to play at the 2015 Copa América. On 28 May, he was included in the 23-man final squad for the tournament by coach Ramón Díaz.
